_sText:
To change height, change the basevelocity under outputs, keep the 0 0

Advantages of this booster:

- Not RNG

- Not affected by boosterfix, hence the "boosterfixisgay" filter (you can put anything there, boosterfix ignores boosters with filters. this is creating a fake one that doesn't do anything.)

- Works the same with high/low ping

- Not crouchboostable

Can be combined with mpbhop and onehop too

Keep the booster 4 units please, otherwise it will become crouchboostable.

Update: used it in 3 maps so far, didn't get any reports of them breaking in any of them :)
